title: Two Marriott Hotels In Orlando Create Colorful Family Fun With Crayola Experience PackageTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Two Marriott Hotels In Orlando Create Colorful Family Fun With Crayola Experience Package Published on : Wednesday, August 19, 2015
Families can master the art of vacation with the new Crayola Experience Package from Fairfield Inn & Suites at SeaWorld® and SpringHill Suites Orlando at SeaWorld®.
Making memories just got more creative in Orlando. Travelers who book the Crayola Experience Package from their choice of I-drive hotels by Marriott will enjoy overnight accommodations featuring free Wi-Fi, breakfast and parking, as well as two adult tickets to Crayola Experience and an art buddy backpack, complete with markers, crayons, chalk, mini stampers and a paper pad for masterpieces. With rates from just $114 a night through Dec. 31, 2015, this exciting package is the perfect opportunity for guests to fuel some fun this fall.
The newest family-friendly attraction in Orlando, Crayola Experience offers visitors of all ages a full day of creative and colorful play. Families and friends can fuel their fun as they fly down the slides on the Color Playground, play games at Doodle in the Dark, create a souvenir out of crayon wax at the Melt and Mold Station or craft their favorite rock star at the Activity Studio. Guests needing to refuel in the middle of the fun can head to Crayola Cafe, serving up everything from simple snacks and drinks to pizza and gluten-free meals.
Just 7 miles from Crayola Experience, Marriott’s kid-friendly hotels are the perfect spot to retreat after a day of colorful fun. Spacious suites allow families to spread out in style while enjoying large bathrooms, comfy pull-out couches and luxurious bedding. At the end of the night, kids can curl up and enjoy their favorite show on a flat-panel TV while parents check their email or post photos from the day’s adventures with free Wi-Fi.
Guests nursing leftover energy from the day can take their adventures to the sparkling outdoor pools, featuring a fun splash zone and plenty of plush lounge chairs, or enjoy a workout in the state-of-the-art fitness center.
In the morning, the hotels near Crayola Experience allow guests to recharge with a complimentary hot breakfast buffet, serving up a variety of healthy and hearty favorites including fluffy eggs, crispy bacon, fresh fruit and a variety of cereals.
Source: Fairfield Inn & Suites Orlando at SeaWorld
